des: "Real old fashioned homemade pasta.  The salt, baking powder and butter are optional.  Also, try substituting 1/2 cup milk or 3 beaten eggs for the warm water."
ins: Mix together flour, salt baking powder.  Add warm water and butter; knead dough until stiff.  Let rest a few minutes.  Roll into a ball and quarter.  Using 1/4 of the ball at a time roll out to 1/8 or 1/16 inch thick.  Cut into desired shapes.  Let dry for 1 to 3 hours on flat surface.  Cook as you would pasta
